whenwhere.ceremonyDesc: Nestled in the historic heart of Greenwich, where our love story first unfolded, the Trafalgar Tavern stands as a beacon of warmth and timeless charm. This is not just the venue for our wedding; it's a symbol of our journey, from a chance meeting within its storied walls to the new chapter we are about to write together. As we exchange vows, we'll be surrounded by the echoes of history and the enduring legacy of love and bravery that Admiral Nelson himself epitomized. The Trafalgar Tavern is more than our favorite spot; it's the sacred ground where our two paths became one, it's our church!
whenwhere.partyDesc: After tying the knot at the Trafalgar Tavern, we're staying right there to keep the good times rolling. Picture this: cozying up with good food and toasting with pints of Guinness (or whatever you like)
whenwhere.logisticSubtitle: Where to get to the Trafalgar
whenwhere.logisticDesc: After tying the knot at the Trafalgar Tavern, we're staying right there to keep the good times rolling. Picture this: cozying up with good food and toasting with pints of Guinness (or whatever you like)
whenwhere.giftDesc: We are truly grateful for your presence on our special day. Your love and support are the greatest gifts we could ask for. Please, no gifts—just join us in celebrating our union

rsvp.heading: Are You Attending?
rsvp.instructions: Please fill up the form to notify us that you're attending. Thanks.
